r.d: Support for YAML 1.1 (YAML Ain't Markup Language) serialization using the LibYAML library.
r.n: Breaking changes: - #69617 yaml.decode_php ini setting now defaults to false. Bugs Fixed: - Fixed parameter parsing for yaml_emit_file() - Fixed callback usage for yaml_emit_file() - Use smart_str_free() instead of smart_string_free() (remicollet)
